About me

Frontend Developer

I want to use my technical programming skills to effectively contribute to the development of projects within your company.
I am focused on learning and developing my skills as much as possible in this regard.

Technologiestools

Implemented various projects on the frontend, developing complete user interfaces, using special web applications to implement the design of the sites, such as Figma and Adobe XD.
Implemented the dynamic functionalities in the developed sites through React library and the Vanilla JavaScript, using various tools such as BitBucket and Monday throughout this sites development process.

Vanilla JavaScript implemented at a very efficient level in many projects, followed by intermediate level interaction and development with the React library in the last projects.

Vanilla CSS, the SASS preprocessor, the Tailwind CSS and Bootstrap frameworks, all at the same advanced level of implementation in the developed projects.

HTML at an advanced level, used both natively and in JSX syntax in developing projects with the React library. In the development of user interfaces I used Figma, Adobe XD.

The main tools used:

  • Figma
  • Clockify
  • Monday
  • BitBucket
  • Adobe XD
  • GIT
  • Postman
  • NPM
